conversations.content: If I'm to live with my darling, I must learn all I can about human culture.
Right, then! Perhaps I'll begin by studying this handy magazine.
...Elisanne! Teach me about wedding ceremonies!
I beg your pardon?
I've been reading about how humans pair off during an event known as a ＂wedding ceremony.＂
This must be the reason my darling still refuses to acknowledge our love— we haven't performed this ritual!
Wait, THAT'S your theory?! *sigh* Well, I suppose I can tell you what little I know of the subject.
Now then! A wedding ceremony is when two partners stand before an audience and take sacred vows to love one another for all time.
How is that different from the pact my darling and I swore to one another?
IT IS COMPLETELY DIFFERENT!
*ahem* You see, a wedding must take place in a sacred location—and the pair must walk down an aisle.
Then, in the presence of a priest, each member of the pair must swear their undying love and fidelity to each other.
Oh, and inviting family and friends to witness the ceremony and give their blessing is an absolutely DELIGHTFUL component of the whole affair.
Finally, at the end of the event, you toss a bouquet of flowers into the air to share your happiness with all!
Then the starry-eyed lovers board a carriage and are whisked off on their romantic honeymoon. *siiiiigh*
Mmm, I see, I see...
Oh, just think of a wedding ceremony between me and my darling!
The following is a work of Mym's imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons or events is purely coincidental.
We're getting married! It's like something out of a dream.
Ha ha! It is no dream, my snuggle-muffin.
From this day forth, we shall no longer be you and I—instead, we shall be US!
Do you swear to love one another, in sickness and in health, so long as you both shall live?
I do!
Then, beneath these hallowed eaves has been formed the greatest couple in the long and storied history of Alberia!
I see why they call her the Flamewyrm, 'cause she is SMOKIN'!
Oh, I am ever so happy to see my little angel all grown up and married to such a wise and beautiful woman.
Why, I think I may like the bride better than my own child!
Stop! I object to this union! For it was I who had my sights set on being the bride of fair Euden!
Now I will RAAAAAAAAAGE!
Oh dear. We seem to lack a bouquet. I suppose we'll just have to use...THIS!
Gwaaaaaaaargh!
How lucky I am to have a wife who hurls my friends about the room!
You are such a rascal, my sweet.
Hee hee! Don't make me blush, dear.
Now come, my lovely! Let us board our carriage—drawn by the noblest steeds in the land—and be off on a honeymoon that bards will sing of for ages to come!
Uh, guys? This is gettin' really weird. I mean, I'm just neighin'.
Bah! This lumpy old carriage will leave us with naught but sore rears and sadness. I have a MUCH better ride in mind!
Begone, you!
I regret nothiiiiiiiing!
Now then, hop up and ride on MY back, darling! It's so delightfully comfortable, you'll swear you're surfing on a cloud!
But is it proper to have me astride you, O love of my life?
Pishposh! There's no need for such chastity now that we are husband and wife!
Now get on me already!
Hee hee hee! Oooo, you devil... You know my horns are ticklish...
...And furthermore, when the onlookers toss their rice into the air, it should always be of the long-grain variety.
Now then, when it comes to gift bags, one can hardly go wrong with adorable plush versions of the bride and groom. However, other acceptable ideas include...
Those two have been whispering to each other for a very long time now.
Yeah, I ain't gonna ask.
That last ＂Bonny Brides＂ magazine I read was simply fascinating!
This newest issue has a special on honeymoons. Apparently the latest fad among humans is to spend time in a romantic seaside retreat.
If it were me, I'd head off to a sea of magma and swim with my darling!
Which reminds me—apparently human swimsuits make both the wearer AND the watcher feel much bolder.
The following is a work of Mym's imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons or events is purely coincidental.
Ah ha ha! Try and catch me, darling!
Ah ha ha! Oh I will, my darling! Despite this magma threatening to melt the very flesh from my bones!
You'll never catch me like that! Tee hee! Tee hee hee!
Goodness me, but there is nothing that can rival the love of my life when she is inside an active volcano.
Ah, but if I were to change into my swimsuit, I might be MORE unrivaled!
*gasp*
Ho there, sir! Might I interest you in a refreshing juice drink? Or perhaps a parasol to shade you from this heat?
I say, sweetums... Might I see that suit?
HOW ABOUT SOME JUICE?! OR A LOVELY PARASOL?!
I'm already wearing it under my clothes. ...Do you want a peeeeek?
PARASOLS! JUICE!
Oh for heaven's sake! I'll buy some of your juice if you promise to go away!
Thanks for your business!
Ahem! As I was saying, I picked out a VERY special swimsuit for you, darling.
...Now how about that peek?
MY ANTICIPATION BUUUUUURNS!
Well then, leeeet meeee juuuust...
Wowza! That guy is a total dreamboat! I mean, he is PERFECT!
Hey, you there! Wanna come play?
WHAT ARE YOU PRATTLING ON ABOUT?!
Uh...n-nevermind!
Ugh! Such a bother... Now then, let's get on with that peek.
Hell yeah, check out that gal! She's a hot potato, and no mistake!
You wanna come play with us, girlie?!
AAAAAAARGH!
*huff* *puff* I think we're finally alone now.
Get over here, darling! It's time to see what you have been waiting for...
My bold, daring, AUDACIOUS swimsuit.
Oh ho... Oh ho ho ho ho...
Uh, Mym?
Oh darling... You're staring SO hard...
Er, sorry? I was just going to see if you wanted to go on a fiend hunt, but you're clearly occupied, so I'll...just...go.
Oh ho ho ho ho... *snort* Huh?! Whuzza?! Wait, was my darling just HERE?!
I'm learning ever so much from this ＂Bonny Brides＂ magazine! Let's see what this article says...
＂The way to a man's heart is through his stomach, and this month's special feature is all about the recipe for newlywed bliss!＂
Yes, that makes sense. Why, even the mighty lioness will hunt down food for her beloved mate.
What a hubby really needs is a wife who can prepare a glorious feast!
The following is a work of Mym's imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons or events is purely coincidental.
I'm home, my sweet!
Welcome home, darling!
Would you like a bath? Something to eat? Or perhaps...something ELSE?
What I want is to give you a lovely ＂welcome home＂ pat on the head!
B-but I'm ticklish! Tee hee hee!
Dinner looks delicious today, just like it always does!
Tonight's meal is a pickled slime and brussels sprout slaw with a cup of piping-hot mayonnaise on top!
That sounds amazing, dear. *munch* By Ilia, it's even better than it sounds!
I swear, I'm the luckiest man in the world. My wife is adorable, good-natured, and a dynamite chef to boot!
And I am the happiest woman in the land, to have such a handsome, kind husband.
All right, I'm off to work. See yo—
Wait, your armor is crooked. Let me fix it for you.
There, that should do it. Oh, and don't forget the lunch I packed for you!
I could never forget it—not when it's chock-full of the love and sweetness of my beloved bride.
That love gets me through each day!
You don't know how happy it makes me to hear those words from your lips!
Have a nice day, darling.
Dum-de-dum! My darling true! I'm ever so devoted to yooooou!
Dinner tonight will be such a treat! Gonna cook up a pile of python meat!
You must stay strong as can be! So you're good at loving meeeee!
Afternoon, miss. Welcome to Ranz... uh, I mean, Randy's Butcher Shop!
We got the python meat you wanted. Sign here please, ma'am.
Of course.
*gulp* Gosh, but you're pretty, ma'am.
Yeah, I know.
I polish my scales and horns every day for my darling.
Auuugh! I can't takes no more!
COME TO RANDY!
I beg your pardon?!
Ma'am! MA'AAAAAAAM!
Unhand me, you foul man!
Bwaaaaargh!
D-darling, why are you here?! Weren't you at work?!
I sensed my gooshie-pumpkin was in danger and came rushing over.
Truly, our love is a strand that connects us across all time and space!
Gooshie-pumpkin!
Darling!
I love you, my darling! *squeeeeeeze*
Uh, Mym. Don't wanna interrupt...whatever this is, but the prince is lookin' for ya.
YOU FOUL MAN!
What'd I dooooooo?!
Hmm, there's a flyer on the ground. Perhaps someone brought it here from a neighboring village.
Ooo, it's an ad for a new play! ＂Struggles of a New Bride: The In-Laws from Hell.＂
Do humans find this kind of sordid familial drama entertaining?
Hmm... I wonder...
This Mym's imagination, people and places, nothing is real, yadda yadda yadda.
Mym! I just found a speck of dust when I looked beneath the couch. Your cleaning skills are simply atrocious!
Forgive me, Mother-in-law!
Apologies won't make this pigsty clean! Honestly, you are a useless wife.
Urgh...
Is my meal done yet, girl?!
Didn't you just eat, Grandfather?
Lies! You're tryin' to starve me and take the inheritance! You're a wife from hell!
That's... I'm not...
Sister-in-law, I'm borrowing some of your secret savings. Once I win big at the track, I'll pay you back double!
You said that last time, and I STILL haven't seen any of that money!
You're old enough to stop floating aimlessly through life and get a job.
Quiet, you! The key is to work smarter, NOT harder! Everyone knows that!
Eeek!
This is s-so hard... But as long as my darling is with me...
I'm going out, Mym.
But today's our wedding anniversary! You promised that we could celebrate it together this year!
Tough cookies, cookie! He's going to the hot springs with a REAL woman!
You... You're his secretary! Nooooo! You're having an AFFAIR!
HOMEWRECKER!
Hey, if you hadn't let all your womanly charms go, he wouldn't have needed to come to me. ZING!
WHAT DID YOU SAY, HUSSY?!
Come, lover. Let us be off.
Take my hand and we will go, dear!
DARLING! NOOOOOO!
*sob* What happened to our love...?
Crikey! This 'ere's the 'ouse what where Euden lives.
Wh-who are you?!
Ah, you must be the wife. We're here to collect on your husband's MANY debts.
Yeah, 'e owes big to the boss man, see? And we's come make sure the bill's paid!
Th-that's a lie!
I have the promissory note right here. Feel free to look it over.
...I've never SEEN so many zeros! He'll never be able to pay!
Well then, I suppose we'll have to secure the money in another fashion.
Lotta rich folks would pay dear to get their mitts on a real-life dragon.
No! You can't!
We can do whatever we likes, so we can!
You said so yourself, there's no other way he'd be able to pay up.
NOOOOOO!
DON'T TOUCH MY BUNNY-WUNNY!
Haaaah!
Gwaaaaargh!
Darling! You...you came back for me?
I'm so sorry, my love! I realized the error of my ways and told that awful secretary  of mine to take her poor filing skills and terrible penmanship elsewhere!
YOU are the only one I need!
Darling!
It's okay, darling. You don't have to apologize anymore...
There you are, Mym.
We're all going to see a new play. Would you care to join us?
You... HOMEWRECKER!
Mym? What are you... Mym, wait! Calm down! AAAIIIEEEEEE!
Ahhh, this is PERFECT sunbathing weather!
Mommy, look! I caught a big bug!
Wow, that's amazing! It looks a little sad though, so maybe you should let it go.
Hmm... Children...
This is Mym's imagination. Okay? Okay.
Mommy, look! I caught a big fiend!
You truly ARE our daughter. It looks a little sad though, so maybe you should let it go.
MOOOOOM! Brother HIT me!
Nuh-uh! I didn't do nothing!
No fighting, you two!
Goo goo gah gah! WAAAH! WAAAH!
My goodness, somebody got up on the wrong side of the crib today!
Well, maybe this will make it better... Peek-a-dragon!
I tell you, honey, being surrounded by our darling children is what true happiness is all about.
You said it, my darling!
Thank every single one of you for being born and coming into our lives!
Augh! I can't let that dream stay a dream! I MUST make it a reality!
Hmm... But can a dragon and a human even MAKE babies?
Ah! I'll go ask Midgardsormr and Mercury! They'll surely know something.
Time to do some fact-finding!
Grrrrr! That Mercury is SUCH a cad!
＂Though you may assume a similar guise, humans and dragons are completely different and can never produce children.＂
What nerve! What utter cheek! Surely the power of love will find a way!
Oooo, and then Midgardsormr!
＂The difference in your lifespans is great, so even if you remained married for life, he would grow old and decay, leaving you feeling naught but heartache.＂
I mean, come on! There must be some...
Oh, here you are, Mym.
I heard from the other dragons that there was something strange going on with you, and it had me somewhat worried.
...Can I tell you something, darling?
I used to think that humans were terrifically boring creatures.
They are weak, and their lives short. I thanked my lucky stars every day that I was born a dragon.
But now, I'm...jealous of humans.
If I were a human, you and I could bear children, grow old, and pass on together.
Is that what's been bothering you?
Why was I born a dragon...?
Listen, Mym. I've got something I'd like to ask of you.
Something only you, a dragon, can do.
Something only I can do?
In all likelihood, I'm going to leave this world long before you.
When that happens, will you watch over and protect it in my stead?
You want me to carry on your dream?
Yes. We both love this world, after all, and I can think of no one better.
Darling, you mean...
We got trouble, guys! Fiends are attacking a village!
I'm on my way!
Just think about it, all right, Mym? It's not like we don't have plenty to do in the meantime anyway.
Now let's go!
This world that we both love...
This world is proof of our love. It IS our child!
Heh. It can be a real handful at times, but it's still our adorable little child.
Thank you, darling. I feel much better now.
Now I will give my all—for my love of both my darling AND this world!
